selected_keywords.reason: Highest-volume core product phrase for this category; directly matches intent like 'dumbbell set with stand' and 'dumbbells with rack'.
Very high-volume generic product term; essential for broad discovery even with overlap.
High-volume multi-word phrase combining 'weights' and 'dumbbells set', capturing additional search traffic.
High-volume phrase targeting women; acts as a style/use-case variant while retaining core product term.
Key exact product phrase with strong volume; users often search this directly for sets with racks.
High-volume demographic/use-case phrase; complements women-focused targeting beyond 'dumbbells' wording.
Singular core term with solid volume; covers generic searches where users don’t specify 'set'.

Broad, high-volume category term; important for wide reach despite being generic.
